data.name: Medium value
data.description: Liquid Assets identifies the value of assets which can be immediately accessed, such as current accounts-1=Medium value (£500-£5,000)
data.source: Based on Experian data.  Modelled data, based on self report consumer survey data combined with Experian Person and Household level demographics and Mosaic

data.name: High value
data.description: Liquid Assets identifies the value of assets which can be immediately accessed, such as current accounts-2=High value (£5,000-£20,000)
data.source: Based on Experian data.  Modelled data, based on self report consumer survey data combined with Experian Person and Household level demographics and Mosaic

data.name: Very high value
data.description: Liquid Assets identifies the value of assets which can be immediately accessed, such as current accounts-3=Very high value £20,000+)
data.source: Based on Experian data.  Modelled data, based on self report consumer survey data combined with Experian Person and Household level demographics and Mosaic

data.name: Medium value
data.description: Non-liquid Assets identifies the value of assets which cannot be immediately accessed, such as stocks and shares, ISAs and Unit / investment trusts-1=Medium value £500-£5,000)
data.source: Based on Experian data.  Modelled data, based on self report consumer survey data combined with Experian Person and Household level demographics and Mosaic

data.name: High value
data.description: Non-liquid Assets identifies the value of assets which cannot be immediately accessed, such as stocks and shares, ISAs and Unit / investment trusts-2=High value £5,000-£20,000)
data.source: Based on Experian data.  Modelled data, based on self report consumer survey data combined with Experian Person and Household level demographics and Mosaic

data.name: Very high value
data.description: Non-liquid Assets identifies the value of assets which cannot be immediately accessed, such as stocks and shares, ISAs and Unit / investment trusts-3=Very high value £20,000+)
data.source: Based on Experian data.  Modelled data, based on self report consumer survey data combined with Experian Person and Household level demographics and Mosaic
